body_html: Are there people using PyTorch with OpenBLAS? Because OpenBLAS doesn't change the number of threads using omp_num_threads, so this might not be enough for those people to avoid setting the environment variable.
body_text: Are there people using PyTorch with OpenBLAS? Because OpenBLAS doesn't change the number of threads using omp_num_threads, so this might not be enough for those people to avoid setting the environment variable.
body: Are there people using PyTorch with OpenBLAS? Because OpenBLAS [doesn't change the number of threads using `omp_num_threads`](https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/issues/131#issuecomment-7403242), so this might not be enough for those people to avoid setting the environment variable.
